name: unexpected-exif
description: EXIF plugin for the Unexpected assertion library

scripts.travis: npm test && npm run coverage && (<coverage/lcov.info coveralls || true) && npm run generate-site
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development istanbul cover _mocha --report text --report lcov -- --reporter dot && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.generate-site: node ./generate-site.js && cp magic-pen-6-colours.jpg site-build && cp magic-pen-6-colours.jpg site-build/assertions/string/to-have-EXIF-data-satisfying/ && cp magic-pen-6-colours.jpg site-build/assertions/Buffer/to-have-EXIF-data-satisfying/

author: Andreas Lind <andreas@one.com>
